overview: Michael Murphy brings over 28 years of technology management and sales experience to his role as CEO of InQuira, Inc. Mike started InQuira in 2002 with the goal of developing a solution that would revolutionize user experience for customer service search and navigation. He has subsequently led the company to become the leading provider of knowledge management applications for the enterprise. Prior to InQuira, Mike served as one of four key executives at Cambridge Technology Partners (CTP), where he grew the Western Region from revenue of $8M in 1995 to $80M in 1998. Mike then oversaw CTPâ€™s sales, marketing, alliances, and partner programs, areas totaling more than $400M in revenue. Prior to his tenure at CTP, Mike spent 13 years at Hewlett Packard. He holds a BA in Management from Loyola Marymount University.
